h3.span: During the statewide stay at home order, all buildings and facilities of the Morgan County School District Re-3 will remain closed through April 30, 2020.

Free breakfast and lunch meals for students will continue to take place at the Middle School and High School through April 30. The meals can be picked up between 11:00 AM to 1:00 PM Monday through Friday.
The District will continue to monitor the COVID-19 and update our website with the latest information from national, state and local sources.

br.span: Durante la orden estatal de permanencia en el hogar, todos los edificios e instalaciones del Distrito Escolar del Condado de Morgan Re-3 permanecern cerrados hasta el 30 de abril de 2020.
El desayuno y el lonche gratuito para los estudiantes continuarn en Middle School y High School hasta el 30 de abril. Las comidas se pueden recoger de 11:00 a.m. a 1:00 p.m. de lunes a viernes.

h3.span: El Distrito continuar monitoreando el COVID-19 y actualizar nuestro sitio web con la informacin ms reciente de fuentes nacionales, estatales y locales.

a.title: Go to comments for School Closed Information

h3.strong: Student feeding will take place at Middle school and High school.

br.strong: This meal will be provided by MCSD nutrition Department for all Fort Morgan students. This meal will be Free to all students.

h3.strong: To pick up a free breakfast and Lunch meal please use the student drop off lanes at the front of the Middle school. You will not need to get out of your car, you will just need to tell us the amount of student meals you need. There will be a limit of 5 meals per car. Parents will do the same to pick up meals at the High school. Please use the back parking lot lanes to pick up the meals at the High school location.

br.strong: Meals can be picked up at 11:00 AM to 1:00 PM starting Monday March 16 th thru March 27 th with no meals provided on the weekends.
Los alimentos para los estudiantes se llevar a cabo en la Middle School y High School.
Esta comida ser proveda por el Departamento de nutricin de MCSD para todos los
estudiantes de Fort Morgan. Esta comida ser gratis para todos los estudiantes.
Para recoger un desayuno y lonche gratis, use los carriles para dejar a los estudiantes al frente
de Middle School. No necesitar salir de su automvil, solo tendr que decirnos la cantidad de
Habr un lmite de 5 comidas por auto. Los padres harn lo mismo para recoger las comidas en
la High School. Utilice los carriles del estacionamiento localizado atrs de la escuela para
recoger las comidas en High School.
Las comidas se pueden recoger de 11:00 a.m. a 1:00 p.m. a partir del lunes 16 de marzo hasta el
27 de marzo, no hay comidas durante los fines de semana.

a.title: Go to comments for Student Feeding

a.aria-label: Low/No Cost Internet Options file group.

span.strong: Below are some low or no cost community options to add Internet connectivity to home without internet.

1. Mobile Internet Options: many cell phone service providers offer the option to have your phone act as a "Hot Spot" for internet access. You need to contact your cell phone service provider for more information about availability and cost for this option.
2. Spectrum enterprise has an offer for free access for broadband and wifi for 60 days for new k12/college studdent households. Click here for more information.
3. Allo will provide 60 days for free internet services for those not currently having internet services. Click here for English Flyer Click here for Spanish Flyer
The Morgan County School District Re-3 does not endorse or recommend any vendor, we are collecting information for our school community.

a.title: Go to comments for Low/No Cost Internet Options
